org.gridgain.grid
Interface GridFuture<R>

Type Parameters:
R - Type of the result for the future.
All Superinterfaces:
Callable<R>, GridMetadataAware, Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
GridCacheQueryFuture<T>, GridScheduleFuture<R>, GridTaskFuture<R>
public interface GridFuture<R>
extends GridMetadataAware, Callable<R>

Extension for standard Future interface. It adds simplified exception handling, functional programming support and ability to listen for future completion via functional callback.

Wiki & Forum:

Method Detail

get

R get()
      throws GridException
Synchronously waits for completion of the computation and returns computation result.

Throws:
GridInterruptedException - Subclass of GridException thrown if the wait was interrupted.
GridFutureCancelledException - Subclass of GridException throws if computation was cancelled.
GridException - If computation failed.
Returns:
Computation result.

get

R get(long timeout)
      throws GridException
Synchronously waits for completion of the computation for up to the timeout specified and returns computation result. This method is equivalent to calling get(long, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS).

Throws:
GridInterruptedException - Subclass of GridException thrown if the wait was interrupted.
GridFutureTimeoutException - Subclass of GridException thrown if the wait was timed out.
GridFutureCancelledException - Subclass of GridException throws if computation was cancelled.
GridException - If computation failed.
Parameters:
timeout - The maximum time to wait in milliseconds.
Returns:
Computation result.

get

R get(long timeout,
      TimeUnit unit)
      throws GridException
Synchronously waits for completion of the computation for up to the timeout specified and returns computation result.

Throws:
GridInterruptedException - Subclass of GridException thrown if the wait was interrupted.
GridFutureTimeoutException - Subclass of GridException thrown if the wait was timed out.
GridFutureCancelledException - Subclass of GridException throws if computation was cancelled.
GridException - If computation failed.
Parameters:
timeout - The maximum time to wait.
unit - The time unit of the timeout argument.
Returns:
Computation result.

cancel

boolean cancel()
               throws GridException
Cancels this future.

Throws:
GridException - If cancellation failed.
Returns:
True if future was canceled (i.e. was not finished prior to this call).

isDone

boolean isDone()
Checks if computation is done.

Returns:
True if computation is done, false otherwise.

Gets predicate that evaluates to true if this future is done at the moment of evaluation.

Returns:
Predicate that evaluates to true if this future is done at the moment of evaluation.

isCancelled

boolean isCancelled()
Returns true if this computation was cancelled before it completed normally.

Returns:
True if this computation was cancelled before it completed normally.

startTime

long startTime()
Gets start time for this future.

Returns:
Start time for this future.

duration

long duration()
Gets duration in milliseconds between start of the future and current time if future is not finished, or between start and finish of this future.

Returns:
Time in milliseconds this future has taken to execute.

syncNotify

void syncNotify(boolean syncNotify)
Flag to turn on or off synchronous listener notification. If this flag is true, then upon future completion the notification may happen in the same thread that created the future. This becomes especially important when adding listener to a future that is already done - if this flag is true, then listener will be immediately notified within the same thread.

Default value is false. To change the default, set GridSystemProperties.GG_FUT_SYNC_NOTIFICATION system property to true.

Parameters:
syncNotify - Flag to turn on or off synchronous listener notification.

syncNotify

boolean syncNotify()
Gets value of synchronous listener notification flag. If this flag is true, then upon future completion the notification may happen in the same thread that created the future. This becomes especially important when adding listener to a future that is already done - if this flag is true, then listener will be immediately notified within the same thread.

Default value is false. To change the default, set GridSystemProperties.GG_FUT_SYNC_NOTIFICATION system property to true.

Returns:
Synchronous listener notification flag.

concurrentNotify

void concurrentNotify(boolean concurNotify)
Flag to turn on or off concurrent listener notification. This flag comes into play only when a future has more than one listener subscribed to it. If this flag is true, then all listeners will be notified concurrently by different threads; otherwise, listeners will be notified one after another within one thread (depending on GridFuture.syncNotify() flag, these notifications may happen either in the same thread which started the future, or in a different thread).

Default value is false. To change the default, set GridSystemProperties.GG_FUT_CONCURRENT_NOTIFICATION system property to true.

Parameters:
concurNotify - Flag to turn on or off concurrent listener notification.

concurrentNotify

boolean concurrentNotify()
Gets value concurrent listener notification flag. This flag comes into play only when a future has more than one listener subscribed to it. If this flag is true, then all listeners will be notified concurrently by different threads; otherwise, listeners will be notified one after another within one thread (depending on GridFuture.syncNotify() flag, these notifications may happen either in the same thread which started the future, or in a different thread).

Default value is false. To change the default, set GridSystemProperties.GG_FUT_CONCURRENT_NOTIFICATION system property to true.

Returns:
Concurrent listener notification flag

listenAsync

void listenAsync(@Nullable
                 GridInClosure<? super GridFuture<R>> lsnr)
Registers listener closure to be asynchronously notified whenever future completes.

Parameters:
lsnr - Listener closure to register. If not provided - this method is no-op.

stopListenAsync

void stopListenAsync(@Nullable
                     GridInClosure<? super GridFuture<R>>... lsnr)
Removes given listeners from the future. If no listener is passed in, then all listeners will be removed.

Parameters:
lsnr - Listeners to remove.
